scripts.umd-builder:install:
echo "Installing up the Angular UMD Builder dependencies...
" && npm i --no-audit
scripts.umd-builder:clean:
echo "Cleaning up the Angular UMD Builder...
" && rimraf ./node_modules/ && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.umd-builder:full-build: npm run umd-builder:install && npm run umd-builder:build-umd && npm run umd-builder:clean
